Date: Thursday, 5/1/1991
Subject: Progress of Jeff Cirillo
Dear Sir,
Jeff Cirillo has nothing more to prove at A Sarasota White Sox!
He has an AVG of .333 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1991
Subject: Progress of Karl Rhodes
Dear Sir,
Karl Rhodes is hitting the ball well at AA Birmingham Barons!
He has an AVG of .314, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
